attributes.action: Add debating and public speaking to the national curriculum
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned call for the teaching of debating and public speaking to be mandated by the national curriculum in all secondary schools in England, Wales, and Northern Ireland, to which it applies.

rejection.details: Please note the Department for Education is not responsible for the curriculum in Wales and Northern Ireland. You may wish to re-submit your petition to each appropriate Government Department.
